concept.title: MapR Streams Producer
concept.shortdesc: The MapR Streams Producer destination writes messages to MapR Streams.

conbody.p: MapR Streams Producer destinationoverviewdestinationsMapR Streams ProducerWhen you configure a MapR Streams Producer, you configure the topic, partition strategy, and other general properties. You configure the data type and related properties, and you can optionally add additional MapR Streams properties and supported Kafka properties.
